title: HOUR 1 - Irving, Durant, Niners
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Irving, Durant, Niners
description:
Kyrie Irving still doesn't get it

Kevin Durant needs to get confrontational to fix the Nets

49ers are saying they don't want to lose Deebo Samuel 

The Mavs are just one good player away

 

Guest: Kyle Hamilton
